actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to improve the operation of the disability retirement program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits a Federal employee from retiring on disability if the employee is eligible for regular civil service retirement. Terminates the civil service disability retirement annuity of any annuitant who earns 80 percent of the current rate of pay of his or her position upon retirement during any calendar year after retirement. Entitles the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to request and receive specified information from the Secretaries of Labor, Defense, and Health, Education, and Welfare to insure the accuracy of information for purposes of provisions concerning civil service disability retirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to improve the operation of the disability retirement program, and for other purposes.
